title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Brazil 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has stayed the same over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2021 to 2022.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2021 and 2022.
Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 2.37 was reported at Year 2021
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 2.36 was reached at Year 2022
min_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2021 to 2022.
mid_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2021 to 2022.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2021 and 2022.

Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 2.36 was reached at Year 2022
